## IHasher.compare() method

Compares plain text against a cryptographic hash

**Signature:**

```typescript
compare(text: string, hash: string): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

text


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Plain text to verify (typically a password)


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

hash


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Previously generated hash to compare against


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

Promise resolving to boolean indicating match status

## Exceptions

{<!-- -->Error<!-- -->} When comparison operation fails

## Example


```typescript
const isValid = await hasher.compare('myPassword123', storedHash);
if (isValid) {
  // Password is correct
}
```
